original_title: Aaron Siskind: Making Pictures - The Work of an Influential Photographer
overview: Photographer Aaron Siskind (1903-1991) guides us through his documentary work in the 1930s to his last period of abstraction. We see him photographing, printing, and discussing his life and work.  Winner of a Gold Plaque Award at the Chicago International Film Festival.
title: Aaron Siskind: Making Pictures - The Work of an Influential Photographer
